sections.title: Welcome to the Cosmos of Flowers
sections.subtitle: Explore Blossoms Beyond the Earth
sections.name: hero
sections.label: Home
sections.content:
## Discover the Cosmic Beauty  
Unveil the enchanting universe of floral arrangements with Space Flower Shop. Our creations are inspired by the cosmos, bringing a touch of celestial elegance to your surroundings.

images.name: Florals in Space
images.description: A mesmerizing image of flowers beautifully crafted with a space-themed background.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Journey through Our Story
sections.name: about
sections.label: About
sections.content:
### From Starry Dreams to Blooming Realities  
At Space Flower Shop, we believe in the transformative power of flowers. Founded by astro-botanists, our mission is to blend the beauty of flora with the wonders of the universe, curating celestial bouquets for every occasion.

images.name: Mission Visual
images.description: An infographic depicting the journey of our floral inspirations from earth to the stars.

sections.title: Our Galactic Services
sections.subtitle: Celestial Arrangements for Every Occasion
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### Services We Offer  
- **Interstellar Bouquets**: Out-of-this-world floral designs for weddings, celebrations, and more.
- **Cosmic Home Decor**: Transform your living space with our space-themed floral installations.
- **Corporate Celestial Arrangements**: Elevate your corporate events with our distinctive floral works.

images.name: Interstellar Bouquet
images.description: A bouquet with an array of exotic flowers, inspired by the colors of distant galaxies.

images.name: Cosmic Decor
images.description: An artistic installation of florals, capturing the essence of space.

sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
### Contact Us  
Whether you're planning an event or want to adorn your space, reach out to us.  
- **Email**: hello@spaceflowershop.com  
- **Phone**: +(123) 456-7890  
- **Visit us**: 123 Galaxy Lane, Cosmos City, Earth
